scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph build --network mumbai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ schmidsi/adamfo-mumbai
scripts.deploy:celo: graph build --network celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ schmidsi/adamfo-celo
scripts.deploy:gnosis: graph build --network xdai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ schmidsi/adamfo-gnosis
